ROMANS¶

“ROMANS” is short for “Reduced Order Modeling for Accelerating Numerical Simulations”. This project consists of Python utitlies that facilitate the analysis and acceleration of numerical simulations using proxy machine learning models. The code itself is also referenced using the term “romans”, e.g. import romans.

Version 1.0.
